pages.text: The Outerlands is the area of the world outside of the build border. This area is reset every 3 months.$(br2)We do not suggest building within the Outerlands, as these builds $(l)will not$() be saved.

pages.title: Dimensions
pages.text: $(l)The Overworld:$() The outerlands is no longer present in the overworld.$(br2)Instead, our new, permanent Outerlands is what is known as $(l:patchouli:outerlands/mining_dimension)the mining dimension$() and mimics overworld generation.$(br2)The mining dimension will be reset every 3 months.

pages.title: Dimensions
pages.text: $(l)The Nether:$() In the nether, the Outerlands encompasses the area beyond the -1,536 to 1,536 build border.$(br2)The Outerlands end at the world border located at 15,000.$(br2)The Outerlands area of the nether is reset every 3 months.

pages.title: Dimensions
pages.text: $(l)The End:$() Only the main End Island is saved between resets to ensure the dragon can still be spawned in and fought!$(br2)The rest of the end is considered the Outerlands.$(br2)The Outerlands area of the end is reset every 3 months.

pages.title: Dimensions
pages.text: $(l)Other Dimensions:$() All other dimensions, such as the Twilight Forest and $(t:Deeper and Darker Dimension)The Otherside$() are a part of The Outerlands.$(br2)The entire dimension is completely reset every 3 months.
